examples.korean: She was beginning to feel her age. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 나이가 드는 것을 실감하기 시작하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was beginning to feel her age. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We’re really feeling the squeeze since I lost my job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 실직을 한 후로 우리가 경제적 압박감을 정말로 실감하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’re really feeling the squeeze since I lost my job. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You come to realize that life is full of ups and downs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 넌 인생이 흥망성쇠로 가득차 있다는 것을 실감하게 될 거야. Neungyule
examples.english: You come to realize that life is full of ups and downs. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I won three billion won in the lottery, but it still hasn't hit me[hit home] yet. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 30억짜리 복권에 당첨됐는데 아직도 실감이 나지 않는다 Neungyule
examples.english: I won three billion won in the lottery, but it still hasn't hit me[hit home] yet. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I guess you don't realize yet. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 너는 아직 실감이 안 나는 모양인데. Neungyule
